meanings.definition: The quality or habit of being on time or punctual.
meanings.sent1: Her promptness in arriving at work every day impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The train's promptness allowed passengers to reach their destinations on time.
meanings.sent3: His promptness in finishing his homework left his classmates amazed.
meanings.sent4: The promptness of the sunrise signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The promptness of the delivery service made ordering online a breeze.

meanings.definition: The act of responding quickly or readily.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter's promptness in extinguishing the fire saved the building.
meanings.sent2: The promptness of her reply to the email impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The promptness of the cat to catch the mouse surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The promptness of the alarm system prevented any further damage.
meanings.sent5: The promptness of the student to raise his hand in class showed his eagerness to participate.

meanings.definition: The state of being done without delay.
meanings.sent1: The promptness of the repair service fixed the broken appliance in no time.
meanings.sent2: The promptness of the decision-making process led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent3: The promptness of the squirrel in gathering nuts for winter was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The promptness of the flowers blooming after the rain was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The promptness of the internet connection made streaming movies a seamless experience.
